review_data.title: A lovely pizza experience
review_data.content: Having taken a room at the Hottingen Hotel, I thought of eating at a place near and the Romerblick was an obvious choice. I went for pizza and discovered that they also prepped some other Italian and Kurdish specialties taking advantage of the wood fire...More

review_data.title: Bon restaurant italien
review_data.content: Bon rapport qualité-prix. Personnel à la hauteur et bonne cuisine. Les pizzas sont très bonnes et peuvent être emportées.

review_data.title: Bewertung Restaurant

review_data.title: Geheimtipp
review_data.content: Meines Erachtens eine der besten Pizzas in Zürich. Immer freundlich, sauber, gemütlich. Guter Service. Auch sehr gut: die Römertöpfe.

review_data.title: Die beste Pizza
review_data.content: Wir kommen immer wieder gerne. Die beste Pizza aus dem Holzofen und super freundlicher Service. Sehr zu empfehlen!

review_data.title: Nicht nur Pizza !
review_data.content: Bestens geführtes Restaurant. Essen, Service und Ambiente tadellos. Preise eher hoch. Jedenfalls empfehlenswert.

review_data.title: Nice

review_data.title: Super Pizzas

review_data.title: Pizza, Pizza, Pizza

review_data.title: Best pizza
review_data.content: This is an old time favorite restaurant, great pizzas! Its a bit off from the city centre but it takes only 10 minutes by tram from Bahnhofstrasse. Very friendly and familiar staff, great with kids. Italian food mainly, also specializes in Römertopf-dishes.

review_data.title: Best pizza in town - but not only!
review_data.content: The Roemerblick is well known in our circle of friends for its very good pizza. But they also serve specialities: Food cooked in a clay pot in the oven. This method was used - as the name suggests - by the old Roman. The food...More
